executive_summary: Implementation of Galaxy Defender as a pure HTML/CSS/JavaScript client-side game featuring a rocket ship that follows mouse cursor horizontally while avoiding asteroids and UFOs falling from the top of the screen. The game includes star collection for scoring, collision detection for game over conditions, and progressive difficulty increase every 10 seconds.

tasks.description: Create HTML structure and basic styling
tasks.requirements: Set up the main HTML file with canvas element for game rendering, basic CSS styling for space theme, and responsive design
tasks.test_criteria: HTML file loads properly with a centered canvas element and space-themed background

tasks.description: Initialize game canvas and basic game loop
tasks.requirements: Create JavaScript game engine with canvas context, implement main game loop with requestAnimationFrame, and set up basic game state management
tasks.test_criteria: Canvas renders and game loop runs at 60fps with basic frame counting

tasks.requirements: Create player object with rocket emoji (🚀), implement horizontal mouse-following movement, and render player on canvas
tasks.test_criteria: Rocket appears on screen and follows mouse cursor horizontally while staying within canvas bounds

tasks.requirements: Implement object spawning system that creates asteroids (☄️), UFOs (🛸), and stars (⭐) at the top of screen with downward movement at high speed
tasks.test_criteria: Objects spawn randomly at top of screen and move downward at consistent high speed, disappearing when they reach bottom

tasks.requirements: Create collision detection between player rocket and all falling objects using bounding box or circular collision detection
tasks.test_criteria: Collisions are accurately detected between player and objects with appropriate visual feedback

tasks.requirements: Add score tracking that increases by 50 points when player collects a star, display current score on screen
tasks.test_criteria: Score increases by 50 when star is collected and score is visibly displayed and updated in real-time

tasks.requirements: Trigger immediate game over when player touches asteroid or UFO, display game over screen with final score
tasks.test_criteria: Game ends immediately upon collision with asteroid or UFO, showing game over screen with final score

tasks.requirements: Increase game speed every 10 seconds by increasing object spawn rate and/or movement speed
tasks.test_criteria: Game becomes noticeably more difficult every 10 seconds with faster object movement or more frequent spawning

tasks.requirements: Implement restart button or key press to reset game state and start new game after game over
tasks.test_criteria: Player can restart game after game over, resetting score and difficulty to initial state

tasks.requirements: Optimize rendering performance, add visual polish like background stars, smooth animations, and ensure consistent frame rate
tasks.test_criteria: Game runs smoothly at 60fps with polished visuals and no performance issues

file_structure.description: Simple client-side structure with HTML entry point, CSS styling, and JavaScript game logic
